metadata.title: CVE-2009-4652 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The (1) Conn_GetCipherInfo and (2) Conn_UsesSSL functions insrc/ngircd/conn.c in ngIRCd 13 and 14, when SSL/TLS support is present andstandalone mode is disabled, allow remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (application crash) by sending the MOTD command from another serverin the same IRC network, possibly related to an array index error.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2009-4652` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ngircd - 21-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ngircd package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '21-1').
